title: Title
reward-config-description: Here you can configure the reward your viewers need to redeem to enter the giveaway.
reward-config-help: Reward's preview that will be created (automatically) when you create the giveaway. This is what it will look like in your channel points panel.
channel-point-guide: Go to {{authorTwitchName}}' s Twitch chat, and redeem the Channel Points reward {{giveawayTitle}}.
help-edit-reward: To edit the channel points reward, go to your Rewards & Challenges manager.
help-edit-page: To view participants or pick a winner, go to your giveaway page.
more-participants-text: You need more participants to end the giveaway. If you want to cancel the giveaway, go to giveaway configuration.
end-text: End the giveaway and select a winner from the current {{count}} participants.
be-the-first-to-join-the-giveaway: Be the first to join the giveaway!
